DESCRIPTION: #ySpeed increases the damage of your attacks by a percentage. Be careful not to go too fast or you might #yCrash!
Your #ySpeed #yLimit dictates how much #ySpeed you can have before you #yCrash.
Going over your #ySpeed #yLimit makes you #yCrash. #yCrashing deals damage to ALL enemies equal to 25% your #ySpeed #yLimit and 5% to you.
Gain 10 #ySpeed for every #yGear at the start of your turn. #yGears go from 1 to 5
Lost 30 #ySpeed at the start of your turn.
